item.title: Acting legend Robert Redford dies aged 89
item.description: The acting star was famous for roles in The Sting and Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid.

item.title: Judge dismisses terrorism charges against Luigi Mangione
item.description: Judge Gregory Carro also ruled a second-degree murder charge against Mangione could stand during a hearing on Tuesday.

item.title: Watch: The Sundance Kid's life in the spotlight
item.description: The BBC's David Sillito takes a look at the career of the Hollywood icon who has died aged 89.

item.title: Kipyegon wins historic fourth world 1500m gold
item.description: Faith Kipyegon storms to a fourth world 1500m title and extends her streak of dominance with a fifth consecutive global gold in the event.

item.title: Israel has committed genocide in Gaza, UN commission of inquiry says
item.description: The panel finds that four of the five genocidal acts defined under international law have been carried out against Palestinians during the war.
